mapper.select: select * from miaosha_order where user_id=#{userId} and goods_id=#{goodsId}
mapper.insert: insert into order_info(user_id, goods_id, goods_name, goods_count, goods_price, order_channel, status, create_date) values(#{userId}, #{goodsId}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsCount}, #{goodsPrice}, #{orderChannel},#{status},#{createDate})
